au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: THERMAL_L1=10m_L2=3p3m_offset_apx12p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(2500,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g4 driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 12.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -98) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 38.42) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.44)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(264)
